item.title: Alicia Power - Deeper Insights Into God Consciousness: Beings Of Light
item.description:
Alicia Power - Deeper Insights Into God Consciousness: Beings Of Light

There are times in our lives when love means more than anything else... When a loved one passes, or we have an accident or an illness, or someone we know falls ill. These are times when we notice that not much else matters.

item.title: Your Soul Purpose Revealed: Your Soul's Agenda
item.description:
Your Soul Purpose Revealed: Your Soul's Agenda

What does your soul REALLY want? What is your soul's mission? What impact does your life journey have on your soul? Powerful revelations of the relationship between your soul and your human self. Insights into how 'spirit channeling' works, cautions and advanced discussion.
